title: Base attributes
data:
A user has suggested improving this page or section as follows:

*"In 3.6 there is much more information presented, like max attributes; in explore mode there's even more."*

**Base attributes** can be viewed by pressing [ctrl](/wiki/Ctrl "Ctrl") + [x](/wiki/X "X").

The window shows current and starting [race](/wiki/Race "Race"), [role](/wiki/Role "Role"), [gender](/wiki/Gender "Gender") and [alignment](/wiki/Alignment "Alignment"), and [deities](/wiki/God "God"). Current deity is marked with **`(c)`** and starting deity with **`(s)`**.

For example:

```
Base Attributes

Starting
name           : player
race           : gnome
role           : Archeologist
gender         : male
alignment      : neutral

Current
race           : gnome
role           : Archeologist
gender         : male
alignment      : neutral

Deities
Chaotic        : Huhetotl
Neutral        : Camaxtli          (s,c)
Lawful         : Quetzalcoatl
(end)
```

## AceHack

In [AceHack](/wiki/AceHack "AceHack") (and all variants that are based on it), the base attributes screen is extended with a lot more information:

```
Your Statistics

Stats
name      : player
race      : human        (originally human)
role      : Ranger
gender    : female       (originally female)
alignment : neutral      (originally neutral)
level     : 1 (exp: 0, 20 needed)
abilities : St:16 Dx:9 Co:13 In:14 Wi:13 Ch:8
naturally : St:16 Dx:9 Co:13 In:14 Wi:13 Ch:8
burden    : 201 (burdened at 776)
Deities
Chaotic   : Mars             
Neutral   : Venus             (s,c)
Lawful    : Mercury          
Other Information
i - Inventory
a - Intrinsic abilities
v - Vanquished creatures
c - Conducts followed
s - Score breakdown
```

In addition to the information in the screen in vanilla NetHack, it also shows [ability scores](/wiki/Attribute "Attribute"), stats about the player's [encumbrance](/wiki/Encumbrance "Encumbrance") situation, [experience points](/wiki/Experience_points "Experience points") required to [level up](/wiki/Experience_level "Experience level"), and is one method of gaining access to other information about the character as well ([inventory](/wiki/Inventory "Inventory"), [intrinsics](/wiki/Intrinsic "Intrinsic"), vanquished creatures, [conducts](/wiki/Conducts "Conducts"), and a breakdown of the player's [score](/wiki/Score "Score")). This screen is also used in AceHack's [descendants](/wiki/AceHack#Descendants "AceHack").

## See also

- [enlightenment](/wiki/Enlightenment "Enlightenment")

[![This article may require revision for the next version of NetHack. Click here for more information.](/images/b/b0/Nh343-icon.png)](/wiki/NetHackWiki:Next_version "This article may require revision for the next version of NetHack. Click here for more information.")

**This page may need to be updated for the [current version](/wiki/Current_version "Current version") of *NetHack*.**

It may contain text specific to [NetHack 3.4.3](/wiki/NetHack_3.4.3 "NetHack 3.4.3"). Information on this page may be out of date.

**Editors:** After reviewing this page and making necessary edits, please change the {{nethack-343}} tag to the current version's tag or {{noversion}} as appropriate.
html:
Base attributes

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search

A user has suggested improving this page or section as follows:

"In 3.6 there is much more information presented, like max attributes; in explore mode there's even more."

Base attributes can be viewed by pressing ctrl + x.

The window shows current and starting race, role, gender and alignment, and deities. Current deity is marked with (c) and starting deity with (s).

For example: 

Base Attributes

Starting
name           : player
race           : gnome
role           : Archeologist
gender         : male
alignment      : neutral

Current
race           : gnome
role           : Archeologist
gender         : male
alignment      : neutral

Deities
Chaotic        : Huhetotl
Neutral        : Camaxtli          (s,c)
Lawful         : Quetzalcoatl
(end)

AceHack

In AceHack (and all variants that are based on it), the base attributes screen is extended with a lot more information: 

Your Statistics

Stats
name      : player
race      : human        (originally human)
role      : Ranger
gender    : female       (originally female)
alignment : neutral      (originally neutral)
level     : 1 (exp: 0, 20 needed)
abilities : St:16 Dx:9 Co:13 In:14 Wi:13 Ch:8
naturally : St:16 Dx:9 Co:13 In:14 Wi:13 Ch:8
burden    : 201 (burdened at 776)
Deities
Chaotic   : Mars             
Neutral   : Venus             (s,c)
Lawful    : Mercury          
Other Information
i - Inventory
a - Intrinsic abilities
v - Vanquished creatures
c - Conducts followed
s - Score breakdown

In addition to the information in the screen in vanilla NetHack, it also shows ability scores, stats about the player's encumbrance situation, experience points required to level up, and is one method of gaining access to other information about the character as well (inventory, intrinsics, vanquished creatures, conducts, and a breakdown of the player's score). This screen is also used in AceHack's descendants.

See also

  • enlightenment

This page may need to be updated for the current version of NetHack.

It may contain text specific to NetHack 3.4.3. Information on this page may be out of date.

Editors: After reviewing this page and making necessary edits, please change the {{nethack-343}} tag to the current version's tag or {{noversion}} as appropriate.

Base Attributes Starting name : player race : [[Gnome (starting race)|gnome]] role : [[Archeologist]] gender : [[male]] alignment : [[neutral]] Current race : gnome role : Archeologist gender : male alignment : neutral Deities Chaotic : Huhetotl Neutral : Camaxtli (s,c) Lawful : Quetzalcoatl (end)
==AceHack== In [[AceHack]] (and all variants that are based on it), the base attributes screen is extended with a lot more information:
Your Statistics Stats name : player race : human (originally human) role : Ranger gender : female (originally female) alignment : neutral (originally neutral) level : 1 (exp: 0, 20 needed) abilities : St:16 Dx:9 Co:13 In:14 Wi:13 Ch:8 naturally : St:16 Dx:9 Co:13 In:14 Wi:13 Ch:8 burden : 201 (burdened at 776) Deities Chaotic : Mars Neutral : Venus (s,c) Lawful : Mercury Other Information i - Inventory a - Intrinsic abilities v - Vanquished creatures c - Conducts followed s - Score breakdown
In addition to the information in the screen in vanilla NetHack, it also shows [[attribute|ability scores]], stats about the player's [[encumbrance]] situation, [[experience points]] required to [[experience level|level up]], and is one method of gaining access to other information about the character as well ([[inventory]], [[intrinsic]]s, vanquished creatures, [[conducts]], and a breakdown of the player's [[score]]). This screen is also used in AceHack's [[AceHack#Descendants|descendants]]. ==See also== * [[enlightenment]] [[Category:Commands]] {{nethack-343}}
